Chemicals legislation: e.g. CLP Regulation, Detergents Regulation, Biocidal Products Regulation, "Seveso Directive". 
 
Environmental Regulation: Eco-design, PEF initiative, Circular Economy 
 
 
Consumer safety
organisation_name: Association Internationale de la Savonnerie, de la Détergence et des Produits d'Entretien (A.I.S.E.)
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
commission_expert_groups_and_other_simil: Standing Committee on Precursors#E03245#http://ec.europa.eu/transparency/regexpert/index.cfm?do=groupDetail.groupDetail&groupID=3245#Observer#C#Competent Authorities for Registration, Evaluation, Authorisation and restriction of CHemicals (REACH) and Classification, Labelling and Packaging (CLP)#E02385#http://ec.europa.eu/transparency/regexpert/index.cfm?do=groupDetail.groupDetail&groupID=2385#Observer#C#Sub-group on CLP labelling & packaging issues#Multi-stakeholder Group on Environmental Claims#E03327#http://ec.europa.eu/transparency/regexpert/index.cfm?do=groupDetail.groupDetail&groupID=3327#Member#C#Detergents Working Group#E01321#http://ec.europa.eu/transparency/regexpert/index.cfm?do=groupDetail.groupDetail&groupID=1321#Observer#C#Competent Authorities for Biocidal Products (Regulation (EU) No 528/2012)#E03125#http://ec.europa.eu/transparency/regexpert/index.cfm?do=groupDetail.groupDetail&groupID=3125#Observer#C
relevant_communication:
Annual event: Cleaning and Hygiene Forum 
Voluntary industry initiatives in the field of sustainability and product safety: the "Charter for Sustainable Cleaning"; Product stewardship Project for Air Fresheners"; Product Stewarship Programme for Liquid Gel Capsules; DETNET Database for classification of detergents/cleaning products; Product Resource Efficiency Projects for household detergents; Cleanright.eu website; Safe use Icons for alerting consumers on safe use of products; "I Prefer 30" communication campaign on low temperature washing; "Keep Caps from Kids" communication campaign on safe use of liquid laundry gel capsules;
goals__remit:
A.I.S.E. seeks to play a proactive role in favour of Sustainability by running industry voluntary initiatives in this field.  
Its second main field of action consists in activities for its members such as scientific studies in relation to detergents, information and expertise about EU policies, mainly in the field of environment and consumer safety.  
The last field of action of A.I.S.E., which is carried out on a need-basis only, is to respond to request from the EU Institution and provide scientific and technical data in relation with the development of legislation.
